title: Tears of the Dragon
description: Trapped in a world where females come ‘in season’ and male dragons battle to claim their mates, Khalia Peterson realizes very quickly that this can be a very dangerous world for a human, or at least half-human, female who knows no season. General Damien Bloodragon, sent to protect the hereditary queen of Atar, discovers it can be a very dangerous situation for him, as well, particularly since he’s no more immune to Khalia’s charms than the bulls he’s trying to fight off of her. Contains violence and graphic sexual content. Futuristic Romance.
author: Angelique Anjou
